The program will implement a login feature with passwords and 3 levels of user.
  # Administrator
   * Has access to all teacher and student functions
   * May [manageAccount manage all accounts]
   * May do a full system wipe
  # Teacher
   * Has access to the [classGradebook Class Gradebook]
   * Can perform [classManagement Class Management]
   * Can [installBuddies Install Buddies]
